name: titillate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone excited intentionally but only a little, usually with sexual images or descriptions: So many adverts these days are designed to titillate.humorous Carter's biography is only spoiled by the fact that he refuses to titillate (= interest) his readers with any gossip.

to cause someone to feel pleasantly excited: [ T ] We were titillated by the promise of things to come. titillating adjective us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˈtɪt̬·əlˌeɪ·t̬ɪŋ/
They attend get-rich seminars with titillating titles like "Turn an Ugly House into a Pot of Gold."
